Wireless connectivity: Offer wireless connectivity options, such as Bluetooth or NFC, to eliminate the need for cables and provide a clutter-free experience.
Customizable fit: Design a headband that can be adjusted to fit different head shapes and sizes, ensuring a comfortable and secure fit.
Touch controls: Incorporate touch controls on the earcup for easy access to volume, play/pause, skip tracks, and activate voice assistants.
Battery life extension: Improve battery life by implementing energy-efficient components and smart power management.
Water resistance: Make the headphones water-resistant to withstand sweat and moisture during workouts or outdoor activities.
